sect3.title: Overview
sect3.para: You can export your image in PFM format, when you choose the .pfm extension, or explicitly choose PFM as file type in the export dialog.
This is a another variant of the Portable Anymap formats. The PFM format saves the image using floating point values for each pixel.
There are no settings to choose from. No export dialog will open after you have chosen your filename. It will automatically start the export.
